title: Morning Devotional: The Light Within
content:
🌅 Good morning, beloved! Today's devotional: 'You are the light of the world. A city on a hill cannot be hidden.' Matthew 5:14

Your light isn't meant to be dimmed—it's meant to shine brightly and guide others. Today, let your faith illuminate every space you enter. ✨
